title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2386.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2386.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For purposes of this Part, the following terms will be
defined as follows: (a) The term
identified school district means a school district in which the number of 1980

New York State personal income tax returns exceeds two thirds (expressed as a
percent) of the number of the reported population over 17 years of age in 1980
as furnished by statistics of the United States Census Bureau. (b) The term BOCES refers to the appropriate

Board of Cooperative Educational Services for each such identified school
district. (c) The term receiver
school district means any school district that was assigned at least 50
personal income tax returns as a result of the temporary school district
address review validation and correction process. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2386.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
